mapper.select: SELECT a.mem_id,c.cp_id, b.cp_qty, b.cp_sts, DATE_FORMAT(b.cp_del_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H시까지') AS cp_del_date, c.cp_name, c.cash_rate, c.min_amt, c.max_disc_amt, c.type FROM member AS a JOIN `mem-coupon` AS b ON a.mem_id = b.mem_id JOIN coupon AS c ON b.cp_id = c.cp_id where b.cp_sts = 'UNUSED' AND a.mem_id = #{id}
select * from coupon_download as a join coupon c on c.cp_id = a.cp_id
mapper.insert: insert into `mem-coupon` (cp_id, mem_id, cp_qty, cp_sts, cp_del_date, rg_num, md_num) values (#{cp_id}, #{mem_id}, #{cp_qty}, #{cp_sts}, #{cp_del_date}, #{rg_num}, #{md_num});
mapper.select: select cp_qty from coupon_download where dw_id = #{dw_id}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_download_history ( mem_id, dw_id) values (#{mem_id}, #{dw_id})
mapper.select: select a.dw_id from coupon_download as a join coupon_download_history as b on a.dw_id = b.dw_id where b.mem_id = #{mem_id}
